attributes.action: All clinically vulnerable need antiviral access before ending covid restrictions
attributes.additional_details: Clinically vulnerable people have been left behind and forgotten.  People who are vaccinated are still getting covid and whilst the majority have mild symptoms, covid could still be serious for those with severe lung disease etc (not just the immunocompromised) leading to hospital admissions.  If access to antivirals is not pre-arranged for these people they (along with their families) will be scared to go out meaning they won't support the economy and will likely require mental health support
attributes.background: All categories of clinically vulnerable people who were told to shield at the start of the covid 19 pandemic should have access to antivirals arranged prior to the further lifting of restrictions.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Prescription of antivirals is a matter for the NHS and not for the UK Government or Parliament.
